column4: A neighboring nation has just started a border conflict with us! Our forces are engaged with the enemy and more reinforcements are on the way.
One of your highly trusted officials has been stealing money that was supposed to be used to pay for government expenses. Shortly after this was discovered, the official managed to leave the country.
One of our archaeological teams were able to discover artifacts long lost to our civilization!.

One of our military cargo planes transporting equipment and vehicles has crashed for unknown reasons. We have started an investigation into the matter, and we should have a report sent to our top military personal as soon the investigation is done...
We just saw a comet that lit up the skies!

A school shooter was stopped before they managed to kill anyone thanks to efforts from our intelligence service. A lot of people are happy that we have stopped it and we are getting praised, but some parents and other activists think that we could have acted much sooner.

A teenager was able to kill several students and some teachers using guns their family had at home. The shooter was killed when police responded, and our nation is currently mourning this tragic event.

An off-duty firefighter was able to save several people when a fire broke out in a local shop and small house. Thankfully, no one was severely wounded, but sadly the buildings are lost. The firefighter is being praised as a hero.

One of your highly trusted officials has been stealing money that was supposed to be used to pay for government expenses. Shortly after this was discovered, the official almost managed to leave the country, but our Secret Service along with our police were able to arrest him before he fled!
A tragic accident caused a huge fire in a shop! Sadly, no first responders were able to arrive early enough to stop the fire from quickly spreading.
Last night, six robbers entered our national museum and stole many priceless artifacts. The police have footage of the robbers and are currently searching for them.
A man and woman started a crime spree in the capital city! Police have flooded the streets looking for the suspects, and a security team has been assigned to protect you.
Animals fill the streets, blocking traffic and causing wrecks Reports are pouring in of animals damaging property and even attacking pedestrians.
Many cities have flooded after heavy rain.
